review: I love the fire stick!!!!!! I have two in my home I brought one for myself and I had to buy one for my mother. Thank you Amazon it came on time.
author: Amazon Customer

review: the fire stick was easy to set up and use.  Very quick response time.  Love it!
author: lizzyT

review: I got this for my husband for Father's Day.  He loves it.  We already have one Fire TV but now he can watch his shows in other rooms.  He really likes it and has used it several times.  I mistakenly thought you could use it on the computer, but that was my own mistake.  It is still cool.  We are taking it on vacation with us to watch our shows on the hotel TV when they don't have anything our kids can watch.
author: Lynn Goad

review: As a recent prime member, I figured I'd pick it up for a full amazon prime experience.  I would have given it 5 stars for price and features but Prime Music Stations are missing from the Fire TV (how is that even possible from an amazon device....) and the HBO go app does not support watchlists.  Good but missing features...
author: K

review: Is cool but amazon prime is more expensive that Netflix. The best is the control remote.  The stick is cheap. Need free app to connected to IOS .
author: Jose M.
